title: All - Download Document
description: This API is used to Download Document

description: This API will help taxpayer to fetch the break up of the additonal late fee posted in their current return period

description: This API is called with the file_num to get the file URL

description: This API is to get the status of the Returns submitted

description: This API is for proceeding to file GSTR data

description: API call to save preference for taxpayers

description: This API will be used by G2B to Save or Update or Delete the User Masters - Products and Supplier Recipients and will return the saved details and the errored out details.

description: API call for getting Signed PDF for a return period.

description: This API is used to Upload Document

description: This API is to submit the GSTR1 return.

description: This API is to generate the table wise summary of GSTR1 data.

description: API call for getting all B2C Large invoices for a return period.
